Description: Plain rim sherd of Attic black-glazed pottery cup; black glazed throughout.
Curator's comments: Object owned and held by City Art Gallery and Museum, Bristol. This record is included in the British Museum database as part of the Museum’s Naukratis Project, a research collaboration that aims to virtually re-unite finds from the ancient port city of Naukratis, now distributed over 80 museums worldwide.
Nine sherds all share the same accession number but it is not likely that they all belong to the same vessel. Sherd joins Ha5421.i and belongs to the same vessel as Bristol Ha5421.b and Ha5421.h.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1636)
